title: Information Operations Planning
description: An Information Operations officer must plan a campaign to disrupt an adversary's propaganda network.

tasks.description: Map the adversary's propaganda network, identifying key nodes, platforms (e.g., social media, websites), and influencers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a comprehensive network map of the target information ecosystem.

tasks.description: Develop a series of actions to counter the propaganda, such as content takedowns, counter-messaging, and cyber effects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer develops a multi-faceted plan of action.

tasks.description: Deconflict the planned IO activities with other ongoing intelligence and kinetic operations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer ensures the IO plan will not interfere with other friendly operations.
